document_data.debut: September 2017(Conclave of Gamers/Hal-Con/DragonCon/Queen City Conquest/Lodo Ergo Sum)
document_data.mainbody:
Region Chult
Settlements Port Nyanzaru
Nine Hells • Neverwinter
Items cloak of the bat • eversmoking bottle • staff of the woodlands • alchemical sticky bomb
Potions potion of clairvoyance • potion of healing • potion of supreme healing
Spells animal friendship • banishment • beacon of hope • bless • call lightning • command • control water • create or destroy water • crusaders mantle • cure wounds • darkness • dispel magic • divination • divine favor • evards black tentacles • fear • flame strike • freedom of movement • greater restoration • guardian of faith • guiding bolt • healing word • hold monster • identify • lesser restoration • light • magic weapon • mass cure wounds • mending • poison spray • prayer of healing • raise dead • remove curse • revivify • sacred flame • sanctuary • shield of faith • silence • spare the dying • speak with dead • spirit guardians • spiritual weapon • stoneskin • suggestion • thaumaturgy • true resurrection • water breathing • water walk

Works Winter in the Midnight Garden
